explanation: [0-0] In front of a white house decorated with red stripes, an elderly man with white hair stands with his back to the camera, bending over on a patch of grass. He is wearing a dark blue T-shirt and blue jeans. Behind him is a black dog with its head turned to the side. The old man is surrounded by iron bars and wire mesh, and a white ladder is placed beside him.

[0-6] The old man is holding a spray nozzle and spraying water towards a white bucket. The black dog turns around, jumps up, grabs the wire mesh with its front paws, and looks at the old man. The white caption "SOUND ON" and a white loudspeaker symbol appear in the upper left corner of the screen, and a white hollow caption "RD" appears in the upper right corner. The black dog falls from the wire mesh, then climbs up again and continues to observe the old man. A line of black subtitles appears at the bottom of the screen: "It’s hard to find good neighbors…".

The white subtitles and symbols in the upper left corner of the screen and the black subtitles at the bottom of the screen disappear one after another, and then new black subtitles appear at the bottom of the screen: "When you do, always lend a helping hand!". The old man intermittently presses the switch of the water pipe at the black dog. As the water sprays out, the black dog opens its mouth and tilts its head back.
